      • countNewNotification

        @Query(value="SELECT COUNT(1) FROM user_notification un join notification n on(un.notification_id=n.notification_id) where un.user_id = ?1 and un.status=\'NEW\' and (n.project_id=?2 or n.project_id in(select p.project_id from project p where p.project_parent_id=?2))",
       nativeQuery=true)
